thread.title: Saudi oil tanker hit in Houthi attack off Yemen: Arabiya TV

author: Abdo Hyder
title: Saudi oil tanker hit in Houthi attack off Yemen: Arabiya TV
text:
Renewable Energy Saudi oil tanker hit in Houthi attack off Yemen: Arabiya TV A Saudi oil tanker in the Red Sea was hit in a Houthi attack off Yemen's main port city of Hodeidah. Published 5 Hours Ago ABDO HYDER | AFP | Getty Images A view of Yemen's rebel-held Red Sea port of Hodeida on November 7, 2017. 
A Saudi oil tanker in the Red Sea was hit in a Houthi attack off Yemen's main port city of Hodeidah, Saudi-owned Al-Arabiya television reported on Tuesday, citing a statement from the Saudi-led coalition. 
The Iran-aligned Houthi group said they had targeted a warship of the coalition in the Red Sea in response to an air strike in Yemen's Hodeidah province on Monday.
